Header.title: NeuroTech
Header.paragraph: NeuroTech provides fNIRS solutions to measure brain activity.

About.paragraph: NeuroTech is developing and deploying a wearable sensor to measure brain activity.  We use infrared light to non-invasively measure changing oxygen concentration in the user’s brain, and relate this to changes in the user’s condition.

Services.name: 8 Different Emotion
Services.text: Moodie determines eight distinct emotions and inform you about their mood changes during a movie or TV series.

Services.name: Your Own Database
Services.text: You will have your own database of movies and series and you can display their rankings.

Services.name: Rank
Services.text: Your movies and series will be ranked accoring to how they feel to you! You can display your movies emotion ranking.

Services.name: List
Services.text: You can list and display your movies and series according to their emotion category.

Services.name: Compare
Services.text: You can compare what you've been previously watched based on how they feel to you, or you can compare the ones you haven't watched yet from our database.

Services.name: Find Similar Content
Services.text: You can display new movies/series based on your previosly preferences.
